data.title: Beast Industries CEO lauds BitMine as Ethereum staking market leader, invests $200M. Ethackbone of stablecoin infrastructure.
data.description: CEO Jeff Housenbold of Beast Industries recently referred to BitMine (NYSE: BMNR) as a key player in the Ethereum (CRYPTO: ETH) staking sector essential for stablecoin infrastructure, justifying their substantial $200 million investment. The investment was made earlier this year by Beast Industries, known for its association with MrBeast's media empire boasting 1.45 billion users. Housenbold elaborated on the reasoning behind this decision during an appearance on CNBC's Squawk Box, stating, "Ethereum serves as the foundation for stablecoin and blockchain." He emphasized the significance of the DeFi (Decentralized Finance) trend for users, highlighting benefits such as increased accessibility, democratization, reduced capital costs, and secure global capital transfers. Beast Industries, backed by a massive user base, is actively broadening its reach beyond this investment.

data.title: Zoom reported strong Q4 results, with total revenues at $1.247 billion (5.3% YoY growth), exceeding estimates. Analyst maintains Buy rating and $115 price target, highlighting enterprise resilience and profitability.
data.description: Zoom Communications Inc (NASDAQ: ZM) posted robust fourth-quarter and full-year figures, bolstered by enterprise resilience and displacement victories, as per Rosenblatt Securities. Analyst Catharine Trebnick maintained a Buy rating and $115 price target. The company's performance demonstrated modest revenue growth, strong enterprise trends, and exceptional profitability. Zoom's total revenues for Q4 rose by 5.3% YoY to $1.247 billion, surpassing Street predictions by around $12 million. For more details, refer to Benzinga.com.

data.title: Polymarket user wins $400K on ZachXBT probe amidst scrutiny of prediction platforms by US regulators.Character count: 112
data.description: Numerous Polymarket users emerged as winners in bets placed on speculation concerning insider trading exposed by an online investigator as US policymakers investigate prediction markets platforms.

data.title: Trump brothers' American Bitcoin mining company, co-founded by Eric and Donald Trump Jr., records $59 million loss in Q4 2025 due to crypto price drop.
data.description: During the fourth quarter of 2025, American Bitcoin reported a net loss of $59.45 million due to a decline in cryptocurrency prices. The company was co-founded by Eric Trump and Donald Trump Jr.

data.title: Omnilogy will be at PowerUp 2026, the largest IBM i event, with a presentation on AI for IBM i. Booth #604, April 28th at 3:15 PM.
data.description: Omnilogy, an international tech developer specializing in the IBM i environment, is set to participate in PowerUp 2026, supported by Common.org. At the event, the Omnilogy team will be stationed at booth #604, offering insights during their presentation titled “AI-Driven Observability for IBM i: From Alerts to Predictive Insights” scheduled for 3:15 PM on Tuesday, April 28th. "Presenting at the esteemed PowerUp event is a great privilege for IT Architect Maciej Wielgus and me," stated i-Rays General M. Attendees can engage with the team at their booth and gain valuable knowledge during the presentation.

data.title: Salesforce's Agentforce expected to drive positive estimate revisions, analyst maintains Buy rating with $281 price target. Stock trending up.
data.description: Salesforce Inc's platform, Agentforce, is expected to play a crucial role in boosting positive estimate revisions and rebutting negative outlooks, as per Goldman Sachs analysis. Salesforce stock is climbing, with an increase in value noted. Analyst Gabriela Borges has maintained a Buy rating on the stock but has decreased the price target from $330 to $281. In her assessment, Borges mentioned that the company's revenue, subscription revenue, and EBIT margin aligned with the expectations of Wall Street. For further details and additional analyst insights on Salesforce, please refer to the comprehensive article accessible on Benzinga.com.

data.title: UpStart Collective moving HQ to US Bancorp Tower "Big Pink" in Portland on March 2, 2026, as sole operating site for startup community hub.
data.description: A workspace and startup community hub in Portland, UpStart Collective, will be moving its headquarters to the US Bancorp Tower, also known as "Big Pink," on March 2, 2026. This relocation to downtown Portland signifies a major step in the organization's expansion, with the new site becoming its primary operating location. The move underscores UpStart Collective's dedication to assisting early-stage founders throughout the region. Established in the historic Olympic Mill in Portland, the organization is now set to operate from the iconic US Bancorp Tower.

data.title: St. Petersburg Spa launches first facial for menopausal skin; 6,000 American women enter menopause daily.
data.description: InnoVitale Spa introduces the Meno "Pause" Facial®, spotlighting a critical issue often overlooked: almost 50% of women are unaware of the negative effects menopause has on their skin, with a majority of medical professionals failing to inform them. This initiative comes as an estimated 6,000 women across the United States enter menopause. The innovative facial aims to educate and counteract this common oversight, emphasizing the importance of skincare during this phase of life. The new treatment seeks to empower women to prioritize their skin health during menopause and beyond.

data.title: New Era Energy & Digital expands with 54-acre land acquisition next to TCDC in Texas, enhancing power assets.
data.description: In Midland, Texas, New Era Energy & Digital, Inc. (Nasdaq: NUAI) revealed plans to acquire around 54 acres of land near its Texas Critical Data Centers (TCDC) campus in Ector County. The company focuses on developing and managing cutting-edge digital infrastructure and power assets in the Permian Basin. The acquisition is outlined in a non-binding Letter of Intent (LOI), signaling a strategic expansion move for the company.

data.title: Registration for Bead Fest 2026 at Valley Forge Casino Resort in King of Prussia, PA is open. Event celebrates 25th anniversary.
data.description: Golden Peak Media has revealed that registration is available for Bead Fest 2026, scheduled for August 5-8, 2026, at Valley Forge Casino Resort in King of Prussia, Pennsylvania. The venue's strategic location in the Northeast Corridor, less than two hours from major cities such as Philadelphia, New York City, Washington, D.C., and Baltimore, makes it a convenient choice for attendees from across the country. Celebrating its 25th Anniversary, the 2026 event promises to be a significant milestone for Bead Fest.

data.title: FMI releases a report on food industry's impact on health & wellbeing, revealing findings of the 2026 report.
data.description: In Arlington, Virginia, FMI, also known as The Food Industry Association, released the key findings of the 2026 Report on Food Industry Contributions to Health & Well-Being.

data.title: Orion unveils plan for Unified Managed Household strategy at Ascent 2026 to personalize guidance. Launching in 2026 for advisors to manage client assets across households more efficiently.
data.description: In Omaha, Nebraska, Orion unveiled its upgraded Unified Managed Household (UMH) strategy at the Ascent conference. This advancement is set to launch in 2026 and will enable advisors to oversee client assets comprehensively within households. By offering personalized guidance at the household level, this enhanced UMH service aims to support advisors in expanding and streamlining their operations effectively. Orion is implementing UMH through a phased roadmap, with the goal in sight.

data.title: North Dakota Tourism offers affordable road trip adventures this spring with fewer crowds and scenic highways.
data.description: This spring, North Dakota Tourism is encouraging travelers to visit a destination perfect for relaxed exploration. With less congestion, discounted rates during the shoulder season, and vast landscapes connected by picturesque highways, North Dakota offers opportunities for peaceful discovery. Explore the state's beauty and tranquility at your own pace this year.

data.title: Shoot 360 launches HER Month in March to bridge gender gap in basketball, with former WNBA player Tayler Hill promoting, engaging in Nike-supported initiatives, and charitable partnerships.
data.description: In February 26, 2026, Shoot 360 revealed their upcoming March initiative highlighting women's basketball, joined by former WNBA player Tayler Hill. The campaign includes various nationwide events, Nike-backed programs, and a charity partnership. This push aims to promote women's basketball and empower female athletes across the country.
Iranian TV: Signs indicate an agreement is imminent.

data.title: United Therapeutics beat Q4 earnings estimate with $7.70 earnings per share. Sales were $790.200 million, missing estimate. CEO is optimistic about future clinical programs.
data.description: United Therapeutics Corp (NASDAQ: UTHR) exceeded expectations in their fourth-quarter earnings report, revealing earnings of $7.70 per share, surpassing the estimated $7.09 per share. However, the company fell short of the projected $813.077 million in quarterly sales with reported sales totaling $790.200 million. Martine Rothblatt, Ph.D., Chairperson and Chief Executive Officer of United Therapeutics, expressed gratitude towards the team for achieving record total revenue for the fourth consecutive year. The company is eagerly anticipating the results of their ADVANCE OUTCOMES and TETON-1 clinical programs which have the potential to introduce new treatment alternatives for patients.

data.title: Business travel surpasses leisure as main factor driving private aviation in 2026, marking stable growth post-pandemic.
data.description: ALTOUR, a company under Internova Travel Group, announced in New York on Feb. 26, 2026, that private aviation is transitioning into a steadier and more mature phase this year. Following the pandemic-induced fluctuations, the industry is now experiencing stabilization, with demand leveling off. Business travel, which had seen significant disruptions, is gradually returning to normal. This marks a shift from the previous years of rapid growth and unpredictability.
